queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

Select D.dossier 'PREQ' ,d.dossier_version version , c.seqno , d.status , d.ordonnateur , d.comments , c.role , concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',c.org,'#0#',c.org) 'Org' , c.result , if(c.result='TIC','MRN_SPE03#F04#Y','MRN_SPE03#F15#N') TIC , c.actual_startdate , c.actual_enddate , c.comments 'CircComments' from mrqr_dos d inner join (select dossier , max(dossier_id) id from mrqr_dos where not(status in ('C','E','U')) group by dossier )max on max.id=d.dossier_id inner join mrqr_dos_circlist c on d.dossier_id=c.dossier_id where length(replace(replace('pPREQ','%',''),'_',''))>=3 and d.dossier='pPREQ' order by c.seqno
